title: Synthesis of MCM-41 mesoporous molecular sieve based on recycled glass fibers from waste fan blades
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01318B, Paper
Nianxuan Wang, Song Wang, Ke Zhuang, Yun Xu, Kai Zhou, Dewang Zeng, Qian Zhang, Jingxin Xu, Rui Xiao
The development of clean energy has led to a significant increase in decommissioned wind turbine blades (DWTBs), which have emerged as a new form of solid waste. Glass fiber, the...
